fields.summary: iOS: Window focus event is not triggered when switch back from another tab
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK: 3.5.0.v20141121153314
Appc-Studio:  3.4.1 GA
Titanium CLI: 3.4.1 GA
Alloy : 1.5.1 GA
Xcode : 6.1
OS: OSX 10.10.1
Device : iPhone 6plus (iOS 8.1)

comments.body: Look for changes in Window or Tab/TabGroup.

This is due to the refactor of alert dialogs and option dialogs for iOS8. Since they are now UIAlertControllers presented modally, the top most window proxy resigns focus when they are presented. We need to ensure that the top most window proxy regains focus on dismissal of Alerts/OptionDialogs

Closing ticket as fixed. Verified (using Vishal's test code) focus event is triggered when switching between tabs.
